data.title: SSI’s MySecureCloud Achieves Citrix Ready® IaaS Cloud Status
data.meta_description: MySecureCloud Verified to Deliver XenApp and XenDesktop 7.5 On Demand Systems Solution, Inc. (SSI), A Citrix Diamond Validated Service Provider, today announced that its MySecureCloud® enterprise class cloud computing service has been verified as a Citrix Ready® IaaS Cloud for XenDesktop® solution. Citrix Ready programs help customers identify third-party solutions that are recommended to enhance […]
data.text:
MySecureCloud Verified to Deliver XenApp and XenDesktop 7.5 On Demand

Systems Solution, Inc. (SSI), A Citrix Diamond Validated Service Provider, today announced that its MySecureCloud® enterprise class cloud computing service has been verified as a Citrix Ready® IaaS Cloud for XenDesktop® solution. Citrix Ready programs help customers identify third-party solutions that are recommended to enhance virtualization, networking and cloud computing solutions from Citrix Systems, Inc. thereby providing confidence in joint solution compatibility.

Customers can be confident that MySecureCloud’s hosted infrastructure has successfully passed a rigid set of functional requirements verifying that SSI’s production cloud infrastructure, based on Citrix CloudPlatform™, powered by Apache CloudStack will support hybrid cloud provisioning directly for XenDesktop 7.5 and XenApp 7.5 for fully-optimized delivery of business critical applications, data or desktops to the widest range of end-user devices.

“Today we find so many enterprises who want to gain the advantages of cloud computing, but demand services that are proven to work seamlessly with all of the Citrix technologies they’ve come to rely upon and trust over the last 25 years. Citrix Ready® IaaS Cloud for XenDesktop allows us to prove SSI can deliver on that requirement and provide peace of mind for them and their users.”

SSI’s MySecureCloud platform provides Infrastructure, Desktops and Software-as-a-Service (IaaS/ DaaS/ SaaS) utilizing all of the current Citrix CloudPlatform, Cloud Portal Business Manager™, XenServer®, NetScaler®, XenDesktop and XenApp® technologies. MySecureCloud is available in self-service or full-service implementations in which administrators have the option to use SSI’s self-service management system for purchasing, provisioning and managing cloud resources in private and public data centers. These Citrix-powered technologies, in conjunction with the management and support of SSI, provide a solid foundation for businesses seeking enhanced productivity, mobility, security and cost efficiencies.

“We are pleased to have SSI join us in the Citrix Ready IaaS Cloud for XenDesktop program,” said Greg Fox, Director, Citrix Ready Program at Citrix Systems, Inc. “Citrix Ready makes it easier for customers to select the most suitable cloud infrastructure products for their specific needs. By taking part in our program, SSI has enabled its customers to obtain the highest quality user experience available today, and the simplest means for making an informed product purchasing selection.”

About Systems Solution, Inc.

Systems Solution, Inc. (SSI) specializes in delivering scalable and powerful technology solutions for small and midsized businesses to provide them with the edge and agility they need in the modern marketplace. Over the last 25 years, SSI has become a trusted resource for professional IT management and market-leading cloud technologies that are backed by a strong commitment to personable service and dependable support. Through SSI’s people, processes and advanced infrastructure─ small and midsized enterprises are now able to dramatically improve their efficiency, security, and mobility like never before. Learn more at https://ssi-net.com.

About Citrix Ready

The Citrix Ready program identifies verified products that are trusted to enhance Citrix cloud solutions for mobility, virtualization, networking and cloud platforms. The Citrix Ready designation is awarded to third-party partners that have successfully met test criteria set by Citrix, and gives customers an added confidence in the compatibility of the joint solution offering. The Citrix Ready program leverages industry-leading alliances to meet a wide variety customer needs, and currently incorporates more than 25,000 product verifications and thousands of products that have been confirmed to work in a production environment by the Citrix customer community. Learn more at http://www.citrix.com/ready.

©2013 Citrix Systems, Inc. All rights reserved. Citrix®, Citrix Receiver™, HDX™, CloudPlatform™, XenDesktop®, XenApp® andNetScaler®are trademarks of Citrix Systems, Inc. and/or one or more of its subsidiaries, and may be registered in the United States Patent and Trademark Office and in other countries. All other trademarks and registered trademarks are property of their respective owners.
